Articles.Content: I have had this problem once before where I had to delete persistants.sfs that helped then, now I have the same problem again with the same world only if I delete that file then the problem is not solved. Can someone help me

The answer I see most often that appears to work is to uninstall and reinstall the game.

 

Did you buy it through Steam or through the store?
Can you load a save from another time point in that campaign? You might lose some progress but better than losing the whole thing?

On 1/16/2023 at 8:14 PM, Vanamonde said:

Can you load a save from another time point in that campaign? You might lose some progress but better than losing the whole thing? 

no i cant join any load of that game.

On 1/16/2023 at 5:25 PM, Mahnarch said:

The answer I see most often that appears to work is to uninstall and reinstall the game.

 

Did you buy it through Steam or through the store?

does everything go away from that world or does it stay the same?

and I bought the game through G2A.

It will be a new, from scratch game so, everything will be gone.

 

You could copy your save file and paste it in but, you don't know if you'd be saving the corrupt file along with it.

 

Sometimes the only solution is fire - and lots of it.
i try'ed to reinstall the game but thats doens't work nehter
I find it very strange that old saves in the previous career didn't work. Never heard of such an occurrence.
